projects.name: Finance App
projects.description: This app allows users to track their financials, with an interactive dashboard, changeable chart types, and intuitive filters

projects.name: AI SAAS App
projects.description: A web application that offers a variety of AI-powered features for creators. Features include chatbot conversations, video generation, image generation, code generation, and music generation

projects.name: Watchlist
projects.description: Create personalised watchlists to track your favourite shows, helping you to stay organised

projects.name: AI Agent
projects.description: Python AI Agent that has note taking features and allows users to query PDF and CSV files using Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG)

projects.name: Sign Language Detection
projects.description: Real-time Sign Language detection that uses Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) networks to process a sequence of hand movements

projects.name: Predict NBA games
projects.description: Predict outcomes of NBA games using ridge classifier and used Playwright for scraping data on NBA games

projects.name: MNIST Digit Recogniser
projects.description: Accurately identifies handwritten numbers from 0 to 9 using Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN)

projects.name: Stock Trading Bot
projects.description: Stock Trading Bot that uses financial sentiment analysis to make trading decisions based on financial news

projects.name: Password Manager
projects.description: Simple CLI password manager using cryptography

projects.name: RTOS Remote Controlled Robot
projects.description: Robotic car project built using real-time operating system (RTOS) and controlled via a controller

projects.name: Basketball Jam
projects.description: 2D singleplayer basketball game against an AI, with various difficulty levels, programmed on an FPGA

projects.name: CLI Financial Planner App
projects.description: CLI app for managing finances with many features, such as managing incomes, expenses, and budgets

projects.name: Remote Controlled Robot
projects.description: Robotic car that can mapping its surroundings using Lidar sensor, controlled by a laptop
